Great. Beautiful. Simple app.  I have a few issues though that are honestly a bit annoying. First off, whenever a new text comes it wakes the screen and keeps it awake permanently until I respond or dismiss it. This is despite even having the "Wake screen" option turned off in settings. It is super ...Full ReviewGreat. Beautiful. Simple app.  I have a few issues though that are honestly a bit annoying. First off, whenever a new text comes it wakes the screen and keeps it awake permanently until I respond or dismiss it. This is despite even having the "Wake screen" option turned off in settings. It is super annoying since it causes a lot of battery drainage for screen on time. For instance I've had texts come in at night when I'm asleep only to find the screen still on and my battery down about 30%! The feature for turning on screen on new text is okay but should only be momentary as per system screen time out settings. Secondly everytime I send a text the phone vibrates and I can't seem to find a way to turn the feature off. I know I have hit send, I don't need a physical confirmation.   Once these 2 issues are fixed I'll def give a 5-star rating coz I totally love the app. Until then I've had to disable it and revert to my former SMS app. Please get the screen issue fixed ASAP.  Thanks.
